final_answer:
The image uses satire to comment on the topic of unwanted pregnancy and the responsibility often placed on women. On the left, a woman holds a positive pregnancy test with a surprised expression, while a man in the background holds a "no abortion" sign, suggesting a pro-life stance. On the right, a silhouette of another man is seen walking away with a suitcase, while a woman stands alone holding a baby. 

The humor and satire lie in highlighting the irony and hypocrisy of someone advocating against abortion but then not staying to take responsibility. It critiques the societal expectation that women should bear the brunt of unintended pregnancies, while some who oppose abortion may not provide support after the child is born.
